author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Shutdown the server on critical child failures that will prevent the server from operating

author: jorton
msg: Move mod_ssl-internal interfaces into ssl_private.h; allow mod_ssl.h
to be included even when mod_ssl is not enabled.
* modules/ssl/mod_ssl.h: Move everything apart from than the optional
* modules/ssl/config.m4: Always add the mod_ssl directory to the
include path so other modules can find mod_ssl.h.
* modules/proxy/mod_proxy.c: Include mod_ssl.h to pick up the optional
hook definitions rather than copy'n'pasting them.

author: jorton
msg: Use SSL_CLIENT_CERT_CHAIN_<n> with an underscore before the <n>.

author: coar
msg: make library name usage safe for space-including paths.
